function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of virtual reality may lead to reduced physical interaction, affecting the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Reduced physical interaction may increase the risk of slower disease transmission control and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Promote the use of virtual reality in conjunction with safe physical distancing measures and hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Virtual reality systems that enable remote collaboration and communication.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, and individuals who may rely solely on virtual interactions.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of effectiveness and precision in virtual reality applications may impact patient care and treatment outcomes.","Impact":"Inaccurate virtual representations may lead to misdiagnosis, incorrect treatment, or suboptimal care.","Mitigation":"Ensure rigorous testing and validation of virtual reality applications in healthcare settings, and provide training for healthcare professionals on the use of virtual reality tools.","Technologies":"Advanced virtual reality software and hardware with high accuracy and reliability.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, and researchers involved in virtual reality development.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions, and technology companies."},{"Description":"Increased reliance on virtual reality for medical learning and case handling may lead to digital divide and unequal access to healthcare education.","Impact":"Limited access to virtual reality resources may hinder the knowledge and skills development of healthcare professionals in certain regions or communities.","Mitigation":"Promote equitable distribution of virtual reality technology and provide alternative educational resources for those without access to virtual reality tools.","Technologies":"Affordable and accessible virtual reality systems, as well as online learning platforms.","People":"Healthcare professionals, students, and educators in underserved areas.","Owner":"Educational institutions, healthcare organizations, and government agencies."}]}
